STR License Number 0485.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our spacious family home located in a highly desirable area of Pacific Grove. We are owner-occupants offering select rental availability each year.

STR License Number 0485

LOCATION:
Located in the heart of the historic Pacific Grove Retreat neighborhood, this vintage craftsman-style home enjoys a half block walk to Berwick Park and the Coastal Recreational Trail, both of which overlook the crashing waves of Monterey Bay. A few steps farther will take you to the many amenities available in downtown Pacific Grove, Lover’s Point, and Cannery Row.

We are a 5 minute walk to vibrant downtown Pacific Grove, and a 10 minute coastal trail stroll to the Aquarium. As proud members of the aquarium, we invite you to use our transferable guest passes during your stay.

Though close to the action, the home is situated on a quiet and peaceful lane located between the main thoroughfares, adjacent to mighty coastal oaks, and a breathtaking

name: Updated Pacific Grove Home
description:
Pacific Grove’s California Dreamin’

Experience warmth, spaciousness, light and relaxation in this stunning 2300 sq ft 3BR 2BA house.
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

name: PG House: Modern Ocean Bungalow Amazing Location
description:
Welcome to PG House, a Nordic-inspired ocean bungalow nestled along the Monterey Peninsula. Our home is an ideal blend of contemporary comfort and coastal tranquility, perfect for your rejuvenating getaway.

Once here, you’ll find yourself in the heart of it all: steps from Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row with easy access to Lover's Point Beach, Carmel by the Sea, and world famous golf courses like Pebble Beach and Pacific Grove Links.

NO PETS. *

Pacific Grove City STR Permit #0483
neighborhood_overview: PG House offers proximity to the area's renowned attractions and Michelin star restaurants. Explore the coastal charm of Monterey Peninsula: visit Monterey Bay Aquarium, embark on scenic coastal drives along the iconic 17-Mile Drive, or wander through the vibrant and historical streets of Cannery Row. Adventure seekers can partake in various water activities or opt for a hike along the nearby trails. For the golf enthusiast, the Monterey Peninsula attracts and hosts the best golf in the world and world famous golf courses are minutes from PG House.
host_about:
We are a young family of 4 residing in Oakland, California.  Monterey Peninsula is one of our favorite places to visit so when we found PG House, we knew it was meant to be. 

When we're not at PG House you can find us at the golf course or embarking on new adventures around the world!

name: Oceanview Cottage - Carmel - Pebble Beach
description: Indulge in a blissful getaway in this enchanting cottage, where history and modern comforts blend seamlessly, providing the perfect setting to unwind, relax, and create lasting memories in picturesque Pacific Grove.
neighborhood_overview: Nestled along the scenic coastline of California, Pacific Grove is a coastal gem that embodies the perfect blend of natural beauty and small-town charm. This delightful neighborhood, known as "America's Last Hometown," welcomes visitors with its picturesque streets lined with Victorian-era homes and blooming gardens. Explore the quaint downtown area, filled with unique boutiques, art galleries, and locally-owned cafes, where you can savor delicious cuisine and indulge in artisanal delights. As you stroll along the coastline, be mesmerized by the breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean, where rugged cliffs, sandy beaches, and iconic landmarks like Lover's Point create a picturesque backdrop for unforgettable moments. Whether you're seeking outdoor adventures, tranquil retreats, or a vibrant community, Pacific Grove invites you to discover the allure of coastal living and embrace the relaxed pace of this captivating neighborhood.
host_about: Hosting guests at my home and for my clients is one of my love languages.

name: Sunburst Cottage
description: This coastal cottage is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit! One block to downtown Lighthouse Ave and two blocks to Lover’s Point Beach!  A 20 minute walk along the beautiful Recreational Trail to the Monterey Bay Aquarium! 12 minute drive to Carmel and Pebble Beach! One of the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro Am shuttle pick up locations is across the street from the cottage. Also, close to Monterey Car Week events!  City of Pacific Grove STR License No, 0455.
neighborhood_overview:
Pacific Grove was founded in 1875, when David Jacks sold the land to the Pacific Improvement Company, which donated acreage towards the first West Coast Chautauqua retreat formed by a group of Methodists who modeled the town after Ocean Grove, New Jersey. The Retreat Neighborhood was developed when the church members started building second homes in place of their tent cabins. Walk the neighborhood and check out the beautiful homes where the tent cabins once stood! You can walk for hours, there are so many beautiful historic homes!

From our Sunburst Cottage walk one block to downtown Lighthouse Avenue for shopping, galleries and dinning. Walk two blocks to Lover’s Point Beach and the Recreation Trail along some of the most beautiful coastline in the world! Walk along the trail to Pacific Grove’s Golf Links, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, Fisherman’s Wharf and downtown Monterey! Although Carmel and Pebble Beach are about a 15 minute drive, you can do just about everyt

name: Beach Front Ocean View 8mins Walk to Aquarium 270C
description: Amazing ocean view from an oversized window! This condo is a tranquil space to relax and recharge. Half a block to the beach, a minute’s walk to Lover's Point, and 10 minutes walk to the world-renowned Monterey Bay Aquarium. Minutes walk to downtown to access endless choices of great restaurants. Fully equipped kitchen, high-speed internet with 55" 4K Smart TV. High-end linens and a Casper memory foam mattress that provides the most comfortable sleep. Coin laundry and free parking on site.
neighborhood_overview: Very tranquil, peaceful and safe neighborhood
host_about:
I am the founder of "Another Day in Paradise - A Luxury Vacation Rental Company" which was established in 2017. We partner with Airbnb to provide travelers unique and unforgettable vacation experiences during their stays. Regardless of whether you are on a leisure or a business trip, our goal is to make sure you stay at a relaxing, comfortable, and tranquil space where you would enjoy your best vacation time.

I truly believe our guests deserve the best! From selecting the furniture, mattresses to even bath towels and silverwares, we always ensure that any items we provide to our guests have to be high end and stylish with highest quality to offer. Our interior design for each property is aimed to create an ambience of a relaxing vacation-like touch and feel with modern design elements.

Year after year, we have been adding new properties to our portfolios. We have over 25 vacation rental properties throughout California, including Bay Area, Pacific Grove, Half Moon Bay, Chico, Clear Lake and South Lake Tahoe. And we are expanding to the East Coast, Massachusetts, as well as Bora Bora, French Polynesia, and more and more amazing world-renowned travel destinations. We own all of our properties in order to provide the highest quality of service. 

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home, and I hope all our properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival.

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. On a daily basis, we donate a certain percentage of our revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to provide homes during times of crisis, and unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to offer shelters for people who lost their homes.

Thank you for reading our story! My team and I can't wait to hosting you in the near future!

description:

The house is just ONE SHORT SREET away from the Monterey Peninsula Trail, which runs from Asilomar Beach to Cannery Row and the Monterey Bay Aquarium. Shops and restaurants in downtown Pacific Grove are merely a mile distant. Carmel and Monterey can be reached in 10 minutes by car. Outdoor lovers can enjoy a morning run or walk along the bay and sunset on the beach. Municipal golf course club house is 1/2 mile away.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet premium residential neighborhood in Pacific Grove "Beach Tract" a street from Monterey Bay and Monterey Recreational Bay trail. A mile away from downtown Pacific Grove, shops and restaurants and famous Lovers Point beach. Municipal golf course club house is half mile away.

name: Beach Front Ocean View 8mins Walk to Aquarium 270H
description: This charming beach cottage is located a few steps away from the beach, captures gentle ocean breeze of the Coast. With its beachy interior design and cozy ambiance, you'll find yourself living in a peaceful, tranquil, & ever relaxed home-like getaway. A fully equipped kitchen allows you to cook gourmet foods. Enjoy the luxury cotton linens, comfortable bed, and stunning ocean views, as well as lush green garden view. At private balcony, you may sight a deer family hanging out at the garden...
host_about:
I am the founder of "Another Day in Paradise - A Luxury Vacation Rental Company" which was established in 2017. We partner with Airbnb to provide travelers unique and unforgettable vacation experiences during their stays. Regardless of whether you are on a leisure or a business trip, our goal is to make sure you stay at a relaxing, comfortable, and tranquil space where you would enjoy your best vacation time.

I truly believe our guests deserve the best! From selecting the furniture, mattresses to even bath towels and silverwares, we always ensure that any items we provide to our guests have to be high end and stylish with highest quality to offer. Our interior design for each property is aimed to create an ambience of a relaxing vacation-like touch and feel with modern design elements.

Year after year, we have been adding new properties to our portfolios. We have over 25 vacation rental properties throughout California, including Bay Area, Pacific Grove, Half Moon Bay, Chico, Clear Lake and South Lake Tahoe. And we are expanding to the East Coast, Massachusetts, as well as Bora Bora, French Polynesia, and more and more amazing world-renowned travel destinations. We own all of our properties in order to provide the highest quality of service. 

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home, and I hope all our properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival.

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. On a daily basis, we donate a certain percentage of our revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to provide homes during times of crisis, and unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to offer shelters for people who lost their homes.

Thank you for reading our story! My team and I can't wait to hosting you in the near future!

name: Picturesque Historic Victorian
description: Historic 1891 restored Victorian in the heart of Pacific Grove, only a block from the gorgeous walking trail by Lover's Point and a block from the charming downtown.  A combination of classic elements of the Victorian era combined with the conveniences of the modern era.  Inside you'll find quintessential high ceilings in a living / dining area with parquet hardwood floors, original moldings with a modern gas insert fireplace.
neighborhood_overview: This is a part of the historic "Retreat District", that originated as a Christian seaside resort, and was incorporated as a community in 1889, when there were 1,300 permanent residents.   You'll enjoy wandering the nearby streets and see many other designated historic homes of classic styles from the end of the Victorian area through early turn of the century.
host_about: I love it in Pacific Grove (AKA Butterfly Town), and can't wait for you to love it too!  Easy walks along the breathtaking ocean path, walking into downtown, bike into Pebble Beach, or drive to Carmel or Big Sur.  4 of my great-grandparents lived in the Monterey Peninsula, and it was a gift when my family could move here permanently.  We live nearby and can't wait to share with you our favorite highlights.

name: Ocean View 3 bedroom/3 bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood of mainly Victorian homes. Walk three blocks downhill to the Recreation Trail, which winds along the dramatic coastline, offering views of the breaking waves, sea otters, seals and occasional whales.  In addition, house is walking distance to the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, the Butterfly House and all the enchanting shops and restaurants in downtown Pacific Grove. Drive ~5 minutes to 17 Mile Drive, Asilomar State Beach, Pebble Beach, the public PG Golf Links (the “poor man’s Pebble Beach”), the Monarch Sanctuary, Lover’s Point and grocery stores (Trader Joe, Safeway). Fifteen minutes in the car will bring you to some of the oldest and historically important buildings in California, and to the tourist mecca of Carmel-by-the-Sea

name: Petit Maison: Two bedroom w dedicated workspace
description:
Settle in for a month or more . Our home is located 2 blocks from Lighthouse Ave, with its many restaurants, and a 10-minute walk to Lover's Point and the coast recreational trail. 1 month required by county.

Our home offers 2 bedrooms, with King and Queen sleigh beds; a newly remodeled kitchen; a workspace with a view; 2 large-screen TVs; high-speed wifi; 1.5 bathrooms; and off-street parking.

Prepare meals in our new well equipped kitchen or on the back patio with our Weber gas grill.
host_about: I'm a marine biologist and writer, working half the year in Pacific grove and living in this home. We love the perfect location, so fun to stroll 2 blocks for cafes or a few more blocks for an ocean walk or a little further for spectacular Carmel Valley or Big Sur hikes. Last year my husband and I added a garage and this year completely redid the kitchen (new appliances, cabinets, counters and floors) and added hardwood floors.

name: Pet Friendly Pacific Grove Retreat w/ Hot Tub
description:
Come enjoy beautiful Pacific Grove at this luxurious getaway! With a private and fully fenced in backyard equipped with a hot tub, fire table, and outdoor bbq, it's the perfect destination for your next retreat.

5 minutes from Lovers Point, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, beaches, minutes to golf courses, trails, vista points, dining, grocery stores, and the Wharf! Endless leisures at your fingertips from this central location.
host_about:
Hello fellow adventurers! My name is Parisa and my boyfriend Kevin and I are very excited to be able to share some of our favorite things with you - pristine beaches, serene nature, amazing food, warm sunshine and gorgeous sunsets, just to name a few. 

As an avid traveler, lover of experiencing other cultures, and first generation American, I understand how important it is to feel welcome, comfortable, safe and situated when in a new environment. That's why I take great pride in creating and providing a warm, unique and luxurious space for you to feel at home, as you adventure and explore beautiful sunny California and all of it's iconic landmarks. 

Kevin is a California native and has spent his entire life in this area. Needless to say we would love to share the local and insider scoop on our favorite spots to explore, places to eat and attractions to visit during your stay. 

We are so happy to provide a space for you to have an amazing experience and will do everything we can to facilitate your trip being one for the books! We strive to deliver gem quality stays and we hope you are as excited to stay at our place as we are to host you.

name: Beach Front Ocean View 8mins Walk to Aquarium 270F
description: Amazing ocean view from an oversized window! This condo is a tranquil space to relax and recharge. Half a block to the beach, a minute’s walk to Lover's Point, and 10 minutes walk to the world-renowned Monterey Bay Aquarium. Minutes walk to downtown to access endless choices of great restaurants. Fully equipped kitchen, high-speed internet with 55" 4K Smart TV. High-end linens and a Casper memory foam mattress that provides the most comfortable sleep. Coin laundry and free parking on site.
host_about:
I am the founder of "Another Day in Paradise - A Luxury Vacation Rental Company" which was established in 2017. We partner with Airbnb to provide travelers unique and unforgettable vacation experiences during their stays. Regardless of whether you are on a leisure or a business trip, our goal is to make sure you stay at a relaxing, comfortable, and tranquil space where you would enjoy your best vacation time.

I truly believe our guests deserve the best! From selecting the furniture, mattresses to even bath towels and silverwares, we always ensure that any items we provide to our guests have to be high end and stylish with highest quality to offer. Our interior design for each property is aimed to create an ambience of a relaxing vacation-like touch and feel with modern design elements.

Year after year, we have been adding new properties to our portfolios. We have over 25 vacation rental properties throughout California, including Bay Area, Pacific Grove, Half Moon Bay, Chico, Clear Lake and South Lake Tahoe. And we are expanding to the East Coast, Massachusetts, as well as Bora Bora, French Polynesia, and more and more amazing world-renowned travel destinations. We own all of our properties in order to provide the highest quality of service. 

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home, and I hope all our properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival.

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. On a daily basis, we donate a certain percentage of our revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to provide homes during times of crisis, and unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to offer shelters for people who lost their homes.

Thank you for reading our story! My team and I can't wait to hosting you in the near future!

name: Seagull on Seventeenth
description: Wake to the songs of seagulls; let the sound of the surf lull you to sleep. This historic 1911 home is a 3-minute stroll from Lovers Point Beach and only a 2-minute walk from the award-winning restaurants on Lighthouse Avenue. A local ordinance requires a minimum stay of 30 days, but you won’t ever want to leave. One mile along the Rec Trail takes you past the dolphins, harbor seals and sea otters to the Monterey Bay Aquarium.  Fisherman’s Wharf and Pebble Beach are a short drive away.

name: Beach Access Walk to Monterey Aquarium & Town 270D
description: This lovely small studio is located a half-block away from Lover's Point Beach. It is perfect for a couple's vacation getaway, or a longer stay at this convenient location. 10 minutes’ walk to Monterey Aquarium and Cannery Row. 10 minutes’ walk to downtown Pacific Grove where many gourmet restaurants are located. Coastal and beachy style decor throughout the apartment. The kitchenette is fully equipped to make breakfast or any meal if you wish. Free private parking in our guest parking lot.
host_about:
I am the founder of "Another Day in Paradise - A Luxury Vacation Rental Company" which was established in 2017. We partner with Airbnb to provide travelers unique and unforgettable vacation experiences during their stays. Regardless of whether you are on a leisure or a business trip, our goal is to make sure you stay at a relaxing, comfortable, and tranquil space where you would enjoy your best vacation time.

I truly believe our guests deserve the best! From selecting the furniture, mattresses to even bath towels and silverwares, we always ensure that any items we provide to our guests have to be high end and stylish with highest quality to offer. Our interior design for each property is aimed to create an ambience of a relaxing vacation-like touch and feel with modern design elements.

Year after year, we have been adding new properties to our portfolios. We have over 25 vacation rental properties throughout California, including Bay Area, Pacific Grove, Half Moon Bay, Chico, Clear Lake and South Lake Tahoe. And we are expanding to the East Coast, Massachusetts, as well as Bora Bora, French Polynesia, and more and more amazing world-renowned travel destinations. We own all of our properties in order to provide the highest quality of service. 

When I travel, I always stay at Airbnb properties. I personally have very high expectations when staying away from home, and I hope all our properties meet yours, knowing you are traveling away from your home. My team members include my partner, Carrie, a customer service crew, a cleaning crew and a repair / handyman crew. They are on call 7-days a week at your service. We strive to exceed expectations to all of our guests with the utmost respect and respond. We will ensure each property is thoroughly cleaned with enhanced cleaning protocols, and with fresh bed sheets, towels, and bath rugs upon your arrival.

I am also an active member of Airbnb.org which is a non-profit organization started by the founders of Airbnb. On a daily basis, we donate a certain percentage of our revenue from each guest's booking to Airbnb.org. Our mission is to provide homes during times of crisis, and unlock the power of sharing space, resources, and support in times of needs! We partner with the worldwide communities to open housing in emergencies in order to offer shelters for people who lost their homes.

Thank you for reading our story! My team and I can't wait to hosting you in the near future!

name: Otter Cove Beach Front House
description:
Oceanfront Home with Spectacular Views

This charming bright and cheery home on the waters edge and steps to a sandy beach that features three ocean view bedrooms all upstairs and two full baths, one on each floor. The spacious master suite features panoramic views and private balcony perfect for relaxing and breathing in the fresh ocean air.
Enjoy cooking and dining while watching seals suntan, otters frolicking and waves crashing upon the rocks or nestle by a warm fire in the cozy fireplace
host_about: I am a building contractor and developer which specializes in green energy efficient / net zero residential homes. This is my home away from home, which is a continuing project of mine for the last 10 years. I am married with 14 kids. I purchased this property because I love the outdoors and the location is centered around everything I enjoy doing.

name: Pacific Grove Classic Craftsman
description: Relax and enjoy your stay in private space in our historic shared home in beautiful Pacific Grove! Here you'll have ample space to yourself in our hundred year old craftsman bungalow. You'll have to yourselves a comfortable bedroom with a queen sized bed, a modern and convenient bathroom, and the entire living/dining room with kitchenette. For groups with a third or fourth person, we also offer a second bedroom with two twin beds. And we're less than a mile to the shoreline!
host_about: For five years my husband and I were Airbnb super hosts until COVID stopped us; we’re starting again. I used to teach middle schoolers about the wonders of science, but now I'm retired and hang out on the beautiful Central Coast of California with my husband and little dog. We divide time between Pacific Grove and Samoa, CA. We walked the Camino in 2023 and love to welcome visitors as we were welcomed as pilgrims.
